snippet.title: DYSCHRONIA: Chronos Alternate Trailer
snippet.description:
Unravel what lies beyond the dream.

Brand new trailer unveiled for DYSCHRONIA: Chronos Alternate—the latest title in the popular VR Chronos series! The VR version will comprise 3 episodes, the first of which is due out in spring 2022. The Switch version will feature all 3 episodes and is due out in winter 2022! The game will feature a full English dub.

About DYSCHRONIA: Chronos Alternate
Game Modes: Single Player
Supported Player Modes: Standing
Supported Platforms: Oculus Quest 2, SteamVR, Nintendo Switch™
Genres: Action, Adventure, Narrative
Dubbing: English (US), Japanese
Subtitles: English (US), Japanese, and more
Price: TBA
Developer: MyDearest, Inc. and IzanagiGames, Inc.
Publisher: MyDearest, Inc. and IzanagiGames, Inc.
Website: https://dyschroniaca.com/en/ 
Chronos Alternate Official Twitter: https://twitter.com/dyschronia_en 
Hashtag: #DYSCHRONIA

Episodic Release Schedule 
VR
Episode 1: Summer 2022
Episode 2: Autumn 2022
Episode 3: Winter 2022

Nintendo Switch™
Winter 2022

English Cast
Hal Scion: Jesse Inocalla
Remaining Cast: TBA

Japanese Cast
Hal Scion: Shoya Chiba
Maia Ganette: Azumi Waki
Noel Ganette: Yuto Uemura
Systelia: Fairouz Ai 
Ash Shepherd: Yusuke Kobayashi
Keith Tozaki: Junichi Suwabe
Elaine Cordia: Yui Ishikawa
Albert Rumford: Show Hayami
Lily: Akari Kito

Artist
Episode Theme Songs: YuNi

Main Staff
Character Designer: LAM
Director: Ao Matsuoka
